overview: When Blanche, a twenty-five year old woman visits her Grandma Ruby, she expects their reunion to be like it always is; filled with stories, laughter, and her famous soul food dinner. But, when the highly anticipated Royal wedding of Prince Harry and Megan Markle airs and steals Grandma Ruby’s attention, Blanche soon realizes that she must step up to the “plate” and learn the family traditions despite her modern ideas of womanhood.
title: R&B
